comment: Based on reviews, thought she would be easy, but it's not the case. She is very scattered brained, and isn't really knowledgeable on the subject. There are 4 exams (your only grades), and extra credit opportunities. You basically have to teach yourself everything in that class. Btw, don't text in her class. She will cause a scene and throw you out.

Professor Cagle has a funny sense of humor, and is pretty open minded and relaxed. One pro of this class is that it never lasts the full period because she believes that students should be let out 15 minutes before the end of class. However, she is VERY scattered brained, and does not even seem to know the subject well. I recommend not taking her.

Professor Cagle does not seem to be interested in teaching, so she's very vague and seems uninterested. You can make a B without taking notes, just make sure you study the textbook for her tests. Always go to class to review the study guide.

Thought she was going to be a good professor from reviews but the class is hard. Attendance isn't mandatory since she posts all power points online. Went to every class, took 5 pages of notes, did the study guide & I have failed every test.You have 4 tests, only have to take 2. Once extra credit opp. If you aren't going to study, don't take her

She is a great professor! Extremely knowledgeable in her field! She makes it very easy for her students to understand as well. She posts a study guide before the exam and if you study everything she tells you, you'll do fine! TAKE HER!!
Prof. Cagle is awesome! She is intelligent, classy, and loves what she does. Easy A if you do the study guides and study. She also gives you many bonus point opportunities on the test. TAKE HER!!

TAKE HER! you technically only have to take two tests throughout the whole semester the way she has her grading system set up. DO NOT TEXT , she will send you out in a heartbeat. Our first test was even open book. God bless this lady. Barely even showed up.Just study the study guide hard before each test and you'll be set! made a b!

Professor Cagle made political science seem like a walk in the park. Her lectures were very interesting & she pretty funny too.She's an AWESOME professor and that wants you to pass.Class is easy A or B  but you MUST read the book.  Gives extra credit on test.Respect her and NOT TEXT IN CLASS..she will kick you out(NO JOKE).TAKE THIS CLASS!

Dr. Cagle is amazing. I had rather get a root canal then to deal with politics but she keeps the class interesting. Her testing policy is PHENOMENAL. Just don't have your cell phone out in class. Take her, you won't regret it.

Very interesting teacher. Seemed kind of unorganized. Only grades in the class were 4 tests. Had the option to substitute test grades. Attendance is not mandatory. Only attended class for the first 3 weeks, after that came on test days and came out with a C+ in the class.
She's a really good teacher! attendance is not mandatory. No frivolous assignments, and the tests are easy if you do the study guides, I got an A and barely went to class. Take this class!

I liked her. attendance isnt mandatory. I didn't buy the book and got a C. I recommend you buy the book because sometimes she skips stuff and tells you to read it at home. The tests are NOT open note despite what i was told. But she tells you everything thats on the tests via study guides. Take her, you wont regret it.

Best class to take for Political science. Class attendance not mandatory. Easy tests and she gives study guides for them. no homework or other assignments. Really great teacher and she always lets class out early.
Decent teacher...Every test, but one was open book-opne note. Attendence not necessary if you are willing to put in work at home as long as the tests are open book-open note

Really great teacher. Classes were enjoyable. I really learned when I was there. Went to class minimally, everything was online and all exams were open notes/book. Best quality is that she gets down to business, don't bother bringing your phone or laptop unless its for notes. She will kick you out of class if you decide to surf the web or text.
Great instructor.  Wanted everyone to get a good grade.  Respect for her class is all she demanded... not surfing or cell phones.  Down to business and liked discussions.

Good professor, lectures can be kind of dry. I skipped the entire time and came out with a B. grade is based on 4 exams you can skip the 4th (final). gives study guides. tests can be a little confusing bc of the wording, but still pretty easy if you study, study, study and study some more. we had 2 exams that were open note/book!
She is a great teacher. Very straight forward. Demands respect. Be good to her and you will get an A. She makes political science an interesting subject- she's awesome!
Great!! Not too hard. No Attendance policy but it is important to show up. Pay attention in class she is easily disrespected. Although I'd recomend her to anyone not a bad class at all!!!

Very good professor, explictly teaches everything. Some tests are open-note, open-book. Wants you to learn material though, really engages class. Do not text or do work for other classes, she gets disrespected by this. Would recommend to anyone.
Excellent!  Covers materials in their entirety.  Students should at least have the ability to understand the basic concepts of Political Science after completing this course.
Very nice lady. Easy teacher. Easy to follow, talk to. I recommend!

GREAT TEACHER..This has been the best class that I have taken since attending KSU.  She is totally professional and if you stick to going to class, test study guides, lectures and the book you WILL get an A.  I pulled a 98 without the extra credit opportunity. The class was very interesting.  Class decorum is important, talk or text you're out.

Great Prof!  I really enjoyed her class.  She is tough, but fair in her grading.  Tests are challenging, but as long as you study and read the book you will be fine.  Most of her questions come from the book, but there will be sections every once and a while that are just from her lectures.  Her essay questions are just from lectures-come to class!
Dr Cagle is a wonderful professor, easy A. Take good notes and don't text in class or she will THROW you out!!!  Her lectures are very engaging TAKE HER ...

Excellent teacher. Too helpfull. Listens to you and always gives you an option. Kind and does not want to piss her students off as long as you don't text in her class. Follows her study guide. You can make 99 if you print the study guide and follow it. Classes last 35-45 mints, even we had 20 minys class when she was sick. teke her 9 pm class.
she was sometimes mean or snappy i guess you could say.

Great Prof. Interesting and somewhat engaging lectures. Hard test, but she covers the material well. Test question may be worded differently and actually require you to think about a subject, instead of regurgitating information. If you pay attention you do fine.

Professor Cagle is an excellent teacher who practices professionalism at all times. As for those of you who don't like the fact that she puts people out of the class......it's simple.....just follow the rules. She states everything in her syllabus and if you follow the rules than you shouldn't have an issue.You shouldn't talk or text during class.

Seemed hard at first, but as long as you print the Power Points and fill in as she goes over them in class, you're fine.  She gives a study guide before every exam, which covers the entire exam, including an exact discussion question.  She canceled class alot and I wound up skipping a test because I felt unprepared, but it didn't count.

Dr. cagle is one of those professors you think of as cool. she also goes over notes slowly and repetitively for us. she also gives a study guide which is exactly like the test. answers questions; attendence is only 5 points. what more could you want?

Mrs. Cagle has a bad rap, she's not that bad just take notes and do the study guide. Although she does speak fast but she takes time to repeat herself and she likes discussions which helps you understand more clearly, just don't get caught on a cell phone or laptop not doing work she will kick ur butt out no questions!!!
VERY GOOD TEACHER, BUT HER STUDY GUIDES ARE LONG-AFTER YOU DO THEM YOUR'RE UP FOR AN A
She should keep her day job
she will let you do 3 test and 3 assigments and use the last grade for the final, which is optional.

Professor Cagle tells you exactly what is going to be on the exams and provides a study guide for each exam. She does seem a bit intimidating, but if you make the effort to talk to her she is more than willing  to help or fix a grade if she made a mistake. This class is a breeze if you complete the study guides and attend class regularly.

dont take her if you can help it. picks favorites. lost my assignments on two occasions and takes off points for nothing. posts the notes online and lets out early [the only good things]. throws you out of class if you're not paying attention. felt she was rude and could not teach. teaching is actually her second job which explains a lot.

This class was extremely hard for me, especially because Cagle is not an approachable person. Picks favorites a lot and grades unfairly. ALWAYS check over your tests and papers you write. She almost always takes off points for nothing. Make sure you pay attention, or she will dismiss you from class. Try not to take her.

She's knowledgeable, but I wasn't a fan of her class. She picks favorites, and if you're shy, don't expect to be one. She's hard to approach, even mean at times. I never knew what to expect with grades. (I am an all A student, but I'm praying for a B) MAKE SURE YOU CHECK OVER HER GRADING. Class was cut short a lot b/c she speeds through lectures.

Easy class!Cagle teaches it very well!Posts power points on webct.Has 4 quizzes 1 of which is dropped that are all open book. Gives easy extra credit. There are 4 exams which are fill in the blank and multiple choice. She only requires that you take 2 exams and are allowed to let your grade on those 2 exams count twice.Class only last like 30 mins!

Super easy class. You would have to try *really* hard to fail. She cancels class a lot, and makes it ridiculously easy to do well. I finished with a 101 and only took 2 of the 4 tests. She gives extra credit (+5 on your TOTAL grade) and open-book quizzes (you can copy DIRECTLY from the book on the quizzes). EASY! TAKE THIS CLASS!

she is obviously liberal, but is very direct and consise with her notes. she respects the fact that we have other classes, and pretty much everything she says in class is on the test. you need to take good notes and use the study guide. there is no way you can fail unless you just don't come to class and never read the book.
Great professor.  Very opinionated.  If you oppose her, you must back up with facts, if not your name is mud.
i loved her. she was very helpful and i learned a lot. her tests aren't the easiest, but if you use the study guide and pay attention in class, then you're set.

Take notes quickly, she goes fast, she always lets you out early, you need her notes for the test though. Very liberal teacher, lots of jibes at conservatives. Will count off on your paper if you do not agree with her view point.
Tests are very difficult and often times contain material not in the book. You have to take notes to survive the tests. Obvious liberal political slant. Not recommended.

Knows her stuff. Was very clear about what you needed to know. You have to be good at taking notes though as she can ask some specific questions on tests. Gives out a study guide before each test. I learned a lot!

Not the easiest professor nor the hardest.  She /does/ shorten study guides for tests.  Test policy allows you to miss one and the next counts double.  Her tests are not the easiest things and count for 80% of the grade.  The study guide is very general and her questions can come from any angle.  She likes discussion and actively encourages it.

Has prefered students that she caters towards. Does not bother to cancel class when she is not going to show up. Has a very rude disposition which makes it impossible to ask her questions. Does not believe in shortening studing guide for tests.
